Tunable.name: CACHE_INVALIDATION_TIME
Tunable.description: The interval used to clear the cache The cache is used to store valid targets when calling ObjectRouteFromTargetObject _find_target by tuning object type (cleaner, fixer, gardening, party bots for example)

Tunable.name: OBJECT_ROUTING_HARD_CAP
Tunable.description: Hard cap defining how many objects can be routing simultaneously.

Tunable.name: OBJECT_ROUTING_SOFT_CAP_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: Used to determine the SoftCap for how many objects can be routing simultaneously. SoftCap = SimCap - SimsInZone + OBJECT_ROUTING_SOFT_CAP_THRESHOLD. Only CRITICAL priority ObjectRoutingBehaviors can bypass this soft cap.

Tunable.name: PROMOTION_WAIT_DURATION
Tunable.description: When an ObjectRoutingBehavior is blocked from routing due to being at the routing SoftCap, how many sim minutes to wait before promoting the behavior's priority.

Tunable.name: ROUTE_WAIT_DURATION
Tunable.description: When an ObjectRoutingBehavior is blocked from routing due to being at the routing SoftCap, how many sim minutes to wait before trying again.
